sn55.52:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn55.52:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena annataro bhikkhu savatthiyam vassamvuttho kapilavatthum anuppatto hoti kenacideva karaniyena.
sn55.52:1.3: Assosum kho kapilavatthava sakya: “annataro kira bhikkhu savatthiyam vassamvuttho kapilavatthum anuppatto”ti.
sn55.52:2.1: Atha kho kapilavatthava sakya yena so bhikkhu tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva tam bhikkhum abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho kapilavatthava sakya tam bhikkhum etadavocum:
sn55.52:2.2: “kacci, bhante, bhagava arogo ceva balava ca”ti?
sn55.52:3.1: “Kacci pana, bhante, sariputtamoggallana aroga ceva balavanto ca”ti?
sn55.52:3.2: “Sariputtamoggallanapi kho, avuso, aroga ceva balavanto ca”ti.
sn55.52:4.1: “Kacci pana, bhante, bhikkhusangho arogo ca balava ca”ti.
sn55.52:4.2: “Bhikkhusanghopi kho, avuso, arogo ca balava ca”ti.
sn55.52:5.1: “Atthi pana te, bhante, kinci imina antaravassena bhagavato sammukha sutam sammukha patiggahitan”ti?
sn55.52:5.2: “Sammukha metam, avuso, bhagavato sutam sammukha patiggahitam:
sn55.52:5.3: ‘appaka te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ye asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharanti.
sn55.52:5.4: Atha kho eteva bahutara bhikkhu ye pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya opapatika tattha parinibbayino anavattidhamma tasma loka’ti.
sn55.52:6.1: Aparampi kho me, avuso, bhagavato sammukha sutam sammukha patiggahitam:
sn55.52:6.2: ‘appaka te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ye pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya opapatika tattha parinibbayino anavattidhamma tasma loka.
sn55.52:6.3: Atha kho eteva bahutara bhikkhu ye tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya ragadosamohanam tanutta sakadagamino, sakideva imam lokam agantva dukkhassantam karissanti’ti.
sn55.52:7.1: Aparampi kho me, avuso, bhagavato sammukha sutam sammukha patiggahitam:
sn55.52:7.2: ‘appaka te, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ye tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya ragadosamohanam tanutta sakadagamino, sakideva imam lokam agantva dukkhassantam karissanti.
sn55.52:7.3: Atha kho eteva bahutara bhikkhu ye tinnam samyojananam parikkhaya sotapanna avinipatadhamma niyata sambodhiparayana’”ti.
